name: Apestroyer
description:
Apestroyer is a multiplayer game, in which you fight with other Ape using people as a weapon.

Controls
Brown player: 

  • Move A D
  • Jump W
  • Throw S

Blue player:

  • Move J L
  • Jump I
  • throw K

Credit to GrafxKid for the city sprites.
